page.title: 27PUBLIC HOUSES AND RESTAURANTS - updated 2011
page.content:
What was the Red Lion is now the Buchlyvie Inn (currently seeking a new owner). The Rob Roy still operates under that name. Both have experienced several changes of Licensee and both now boast restaurant facilities. Neither offers accommodation.

There are now no other restaurants in Buchlyvie, although recently the pottery has opened The Coffee Kiln, with a modest menu of hot meals, home baking and snack foods on offer.


Arthur Benns
